keyword: calories in breadsticks from pizza hut
title: Calories in Pizza Hut Breadsticks
meta_description: Discover calories in breadsticks from Pizza Hut per stick, plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs, protein, fat, and serving tips for your meal.
assumptions: Standard Pizza Hut breadstick (about 40g each), baked fresh, no dipping sauce or toppings included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and additions like sauce; check Pizza Hut's official site or app for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One Pizza Hut breadstick has about 140 kcal, with 20 g carbs and 4 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add marinara dipping sauce (1 oz per breadstick)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Pizza Hut breadstick?
What are the carbs in breadsticks from Pizza Hut?
faqs.a: About 20 g carbs per breadstick, including 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: How many calories in a full order of Pizza Hut breadsticks?
faqs.a: A typical order of 5 breadsticks totals around 700 kcal.

faqs.q: Are Pizza Hut breadsticks high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 250 mg sodium per breadstick due to seasoning.

faqs.q: Do Pizza Hut breadsticks have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat per breadstick.
